And as achmid said

IF you have problems saving, try this:

#1. navigate to your disciples 3 installation folder e.g. C:\Disciples III\
#2. create a folder called save  e.g. C:\Disciples III\save\

Anyone else getting an error when you try to install?

I'm hitting "ShellExecuteEx failed; code 2.  The system cannot find the file specified".

Now I wait for the inevitable really simple and obvious thing I didn't think to do.
To work around 'ShellExecuteEx failed; code 2. The system cannot find the file specified': right-click DIIISetup.exe and select 'Run as administrator'

I'm sorry guys, please ignore my first comment about the gome not installing or working,the solution is as many have noted to click on DISIII with the right mouse button and choose run as administrator.

ok to everyone looking for the crack its accualy not that hard to get to and this will only help if your using deamon tools... once you have the iso mounted hit the start menu -> computer -> right click on the virtual drive you have mounted -> open (or open in new window). and thats where the vitality folder is with the crack
